titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for qualified national service educational awards.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for qualified national service educational awards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any qualified national service educational award. Provides for coordination with the Hope and Lifetime Learning credits.
